<p> </p><p>We are incredibly excited to announce the second workshop held by the LMU Open Science Initiative in Medicine (OSIM):</p><p style="text-align: center;"><strong>"Open Science - Reproduciblity, Data Sharing, Practical Aspects"</strong></p><p>This time the workshop will be online, consisting of two parts:</p><ul>
<li><a href="https://t1p.de/j6fr">Input videos on YouTube </a></li>
<li>An exciting <strong><em>Keynote</em></strong> ("Open Science for Research Questions, Data, and Analyses")  by Professor of Clinical Biostatistics and Medical Decision Making Ewout Steyerberg on <a href="https://t1p.de/87p0">Zoom</a> (July 2nd 2020)</li>
</ul>
<p>Detailed information can be found in the following flyer:</p><p><img src="../../images/workshop_osim.jpg" alt="online_workshop_osim"><br><br></p><p> </p><div class="g-clear"></div>
